title: FuncDraw Cartoon Library
description: Collections of landscape, animal, and character primitives for cartoon scenes.

catalogEntries.name: Evergreen Tree
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Layered evergreen tree module that can be dropped into any cartoon landscape.

catalogEntries.name: City Car
catalogEntries.catalogSvg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="-12 -8 24 16"><ellipse cx="0" cy="4" rx="8" ry="2" fill="rgba(15,23,42,0.2)"/><rect x="-8" y="-1" width="16" height="5" rx="1.2" fill="#ef4444" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.4"/><polygon points="-4,-1 -2,-5 4,-5 6,-1" fill="#fee2e2" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.3"/><circle cx="-4.5" cy="3" r="2" fill="#0f172a"/><circle cx="4.5" cy="3" r="2" fill="#0f172a"/></svg>
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Rounded coupe with stylized windows, headlights, and reusable wheel geometry.

catalogEntries.name: City House — Cottage
catalogEntries.catalogSvg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="-8 -8 16 16"><polygon points="-6,-2 0,-7 6,-2" fill="#b45309"/><rect x="-5" y="-2" width="10" height="7" fill="#fcd34d" stroke="#78350f" stroke-width="0.3"/><rect x="-1" y="1" width="2" height="3" fill="#92400e"/><rect x="-4" y="-0.5" width="2" height="2" fill="#e0f2fe"/><rect x="2" y="-0.5" width="2" height="2" fill="#e0f2fe"/></svg>
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Compact home facade with roof trim, twin windows, and a welcoming doorway.

catalogEntries.name: City House — Townhome
catalogEntries.catalogSvg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="-7 -8 14 16"><rect x="-4" y="-6" width="8" height="10" fill="#fef3c7" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.3"/><rect x="-1" y="2" width="2" height="3" fill="#4c0519"/><rect x="-3.5" y="-4" width="2" height="2" fill="#cffafe"/><rect x="1.5" y="-4" width="2" height="2" fill="#cffafe"/><rect x="-3.5" y="-1" width="2" height="2" fill="#cffafe"/><rect x="1.5" y="-1" width="2" height="2" fill="#cffafe"/></svg>
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Vertical townhouse with stacked windows, accent column, and inset stoop.

catalogEntries.name: City House — Modern
catalogEntries.catalogSvg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="-10 -8 20 16"><rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="3" fill="#cbd5f5"/><rect x="-10" y="-5" width="9" height="5" fill="#fcd34d" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.3"/><rect x="-1" y="-7" width="11" height="7" fill="#f8fafc" stroke="#0f172a" stroke-width="0.3"/><rect x="0.5" y="-6" width="2.5" height="5.5" fill="rgba(14,165,233,0.5)"/><rect x="3.4" y="-6" width="2.5" height="5.5" fill="rgba(14,165,233,0.5)"/><rect x="6.4" y="-6" width="2.5" height="5.5" fill="rgba(14,165,233,0.5)"/></svg>
catalogEntries.descriptionHtml: Modern split-level facade with glass atrium panels and bold accent lighting.
